message: How far had we run?
Once we're out of the alley, we stop to scan the area.
I no longer hear footsteps behind us. Did we lose them?

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hah, hah, hah..."
Once I'm sure we're safe for the moment, I lean against a nearby wall to catch my breath.
Mink is only slightly out of breath. He keeps a watchful eye on the area.
Just as I start to feel like I can breathe again, my Coil beeps.

name: 蓮
message: "It's a game."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Again?! Why now?!"
It looked like Mink received something too.

name: トリ
message: "Looks like a game to me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Seriously? I got it too."

name: 蓮
message: "It appears to autoplay."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh, it's just more cryptic bullshit... and what's this invitation thing?"

name: ミンク
message: "Invitation?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Didn't you get one?"

name: ミンク
message: "Show me."
I show Mink the invitation on my Coil.

name: 蒼葉
message: "So I'm the only one who got it?"

name: ミンク
message: "Now that's fishy as hell."
Can't say I don't agree. But there's also something about that game...

name: 蒼葉
message: "I think this game predicted Granny's kidnapping."

name: ミンク
message: "You think what?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I told you, didn't I? I got a game like this before. Maybe this one means something too..."

name: ミンク
message: "Must be a trap. If they knew she was gonna get abducted, they were in on it."
He has a point...
But even if it is a trap, it has to mean something, right?
A cave, a treasure chest, a key, a large door...

name: 蒼葉
message: "...This time it's a message."
There's an image attached. A map of the Old Residential District.
A spot is marked in red, on the left edge of the wall surrounding Platinum Jail.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let's just catch up with Mr. Haga for now."

name: ミンク
message: "The guy who can get us into Platinum Jail?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."
We head for the spot marked on the map to meet up with Mr. Haga.
